Send message by pressing ENTER: Romela molaetsa ka ho hatella ENTER
Enable mic to give voice input: Numella mic ho fana ka lentsoe
Enable speech output only for speech inp: Etsa hore puo e hlahisoe feela bakeng sa polelo ea puo
Speech Output Always ON: Puo ea puo e ntseng e tsoela pele
Enable speech output regardless of input: Etsa hore puo e hlahisoe ho sa tsotellehe mofuta oa tlhahiso
Select backend server for the app: Khetha seva sa backend bakeng sa app
Please login again to change SUSI server: Ka kopo oena hape ho fetola seva sa SUSI
Reset the speed at which the text is spo: Hlahisa lebelo leo temana eo e buuoang ka eona e tloaelehileng
Reset the pitch at which the text is spo: Hlahisa setšoantšo seo ho buuoang ka sona ho sa fetohe
Play a short demonstration of speech syn: Bapala pontšo e khutšoanyane ea puo ea puo
Please enter a valid URL first: Ka kopo kenya URL e nepahetseng pele
Please verify that Susi Hardware is runn: Ka kopo netefatsa hore Susi Hardware e mathela ho aterese eo u e buileng
Login Failed. Try Again: Ho kena ho hlolehile. Leka hape
Some error occurred. Try Again: Phoso e itseng e etsahetse. Leka hape
Please check your internet connection: Ka kopo, sheba marang-rang a hau
Enter a valid Email Address: Kenya lengolo le nepahetseng la imeile
Minimum 6 characters required: Litlhaku tse fokolang tse 6 li hlokahale
Email already taken. Please try with ano: Imeile e seng e nkiloe. Ka kopo leka ka e 'ngoe ea imeile.
If you have an Account Please Login: Haeba u na le ak'haonte, kopa u kene
Invalid Credentials. Please check your E: Matšeliso a sa lokelang. Ka kopo, sheba Imeile kapa Password.
Failed. Try Again: Ha ea ka ea atleha. Leka hape
Message Background Image URL: Molaetsa oa setšoantšo sa URL URL
Expand your experience get closer and st: Eketsa phihlelo ea hau ho atamela mme u lule u le teng hona joale
Add your phone number: Kenya nomoro ea hau ea mohala
We will text a verification code to this: Re tla romela molaetsa oa kholisiso ho nomoro ena. Melao e tloaelehileng ea SMS e ka sebetsa.
